<div class="bottomstandard"><img src="/images/news_home.jpg" class="round"></div>

<h3>UBM Tech Game Network</h3>
<hr class="orange" />

<p class="bottomstandard">The UBM Tech Game Network delivers market-defining platforms that drives community and business partnerships through its award-winning lineup of <strong>Game Developer Conference Â®</strong> events, <strong>Independent Games Festival and Choice Awards</strong>, <strong>GDC Play</strong>, the internationally recognized and Webby Award-winning online community, <strong>Gamasutra.com</strong>, <strong>Gamecareerguide.com</strong>, <strong>GDC Vault.com</strong>.</p>

<div class="row bottomstandard">
     <div class="large-4 columns">
          <h3>EVENTS</h3>
          <hr class="orange"/>
          <div class="bottom10"><a href="/gdc/"><img src="/images/logo-gdc.jpg" /></a></div>
          <div class="bottom10"><a href="/gdceurope/"><img src="/images/logo-gdceurope.jpg" /></a></div>
          <div class="bottom10"><a href="/gdcchina/"><img src="/images/logo-gdcchina.jpg" /></a></div>

          <a href="/events/" class="learnmore">DISCOVER OUR EVENTS</a>
     </div>
     <div class="large-4 columns">
          <h3>AWARDS</h3>
          <hr class="yellow"/>
          <div class="bottom10"><a href="/awards/independent-game-festival.php"><img src="/images/logo-igf.jpg" /></a></div>
          <div class="bottom10"><a href="/awards/game-developers-choice-awards.php"><img src="/images/logo-gdca.jpg" /></a></div>
          <a href="/awards/" class="learnmore">INDUSTRY AWARDS</a>
     </div>
     <div class="large-4 columns">
          <h3>ONLINE</h3>
          <hr class="green"/>
          <div class="bottom10"><a href="/online/sponsorships.php"><img src="/images/logo-gamasutra.jpg" /></a></div>
          <div class="bottom10"><a href="/education/featured-school.php"><img src="/images/logo-gcg.jpg" /></a></div>
          <a href="/online/" class="learnmore">EXPAND YOUR REACH</a>
     </div>
</div>

<hr />

<div class="row bottomstandard hide-for-small">
	<div class="large-12 columns">
		<div class="center"><h3>People Love Working With Us</h3></div>

		<!--flexslider-->
		<div id="main" role="main">
			<section class="slider">
				<div class="flexslider">
					<ul class="slides">
						<li>
							<div class="caption">
								<p>GDC is where the industry comes together so we can push the limits of game play around the world.</p>
								<p><strong>Brian Waddle, VP World Wide Sales & Marketing, Havok</strong></p>
							</div>
							<div class="slider_logo">
								<img src="/images/logo_havok.png" alt="Havok logo" />
							</div>
						</li>
						<li>
							<div class="caption">
								<p>GDC Next is a premier, top-priority gaming conference for us. It represents a high quality platform to meet gaming professionals across the entire ecosystem and share the latest innovations and market dynamics.</p>
								<p><strong>Rennie Allen, Security Solutions Architect, Arxan</strong></p>
							</div>
							<div class="slider_logo">
								<img src="/images/logo_arxan.png" alt="Arxan logo" />
							</div>
						</li>
						<li>
							<div class="caption">
								<p>Our private meeting suite at GDC Europe is the ideal place to meet with C-levels during what I consider the best week to conduct online gaming business in Europe year after year.</p>
								<p><strong>John Warren, CEO, Minicore Studios LLC</strong></p>
							</div>
							<div class="slider_logo">
								<img src="/images/logo_minicore.png" alt="MiniCore logo" />
							</div>
						</li>
						<li>
							<div class="caption">
								<p>GDC provides an outstanding opportunity for us to collaborate and discuss game-play ideas with current partners, and work with new developers on how their creative visions can be featured on our platforms.</p>
								<p><strong>Nintendo</strong></p>
							</div>
							<div class="slider_logo">
								<img src="/images/logo_nintendo.png" alt="Nintendo logo" />

<script type="text/javascript">
$(function(){
 SyntaxHighlighter.all();
});
$(window).load(function(){
 $('.flexslider').flexslider({
   animation: "slide",
   start: function(slider){
     $('body').removeClass('loading');
   }
 });
});
</script>

<p class="desc"><a href="http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/GameDevelopersConference/~3/xt3To-9xL58/gdc_sees_record-breaking_atten.html" target="_blank">GDC sees record-breaking attendance and announces 2016 dates</a>

              <li><a href="http://tech.ubm.com/community-brands/enterprise-it/" target="_blank">Enterprise IT</a></li>

              <li><a href="http://tech.ubm.com/community-brands/technical-service-and-support/" target="_blank">IT Services & Support</a></li>
            </ul>
          </div>
          <div class="list-div" id="working-with-us">
			<strong class="footer_title">WORKING WITH US</strong><br />

      </div><!--end rightlinks-->
